short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces images with random glitter gifs reminiscent of the Myspace era. Also replaces site fonts to add even more fun.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Miss how crazy Myspace pages were and the capability of total creative freedom? Take that back with Needs More Glitter! Disrupt your usual browsing with an onslaught of glitter gifs and handwritten text on any website you may visit. This extension replaces all images on the webpage with a random selection of glitter gifs, reminiscent of over-customized Myspace pages and early internet websites, along with changing web fonts to totally fun options like Comic Sans.
